execution_quality: Good execution with successful Docker build, but workflow YAML validation errors indicate the Edit operations introduced syntax issues that weren't caught during development.
work_category: Build system configuration update to replace Gradle with Maven, modifying project build files and GitHub Actions workflow.
summary: Agent completed the requested build system changes and Docker configuration successfully, earning user approval ('sounds good'). However, subsequent GitHub Actions workflow validation failures revealed syntax errors introduced during YAML editing, indicating the agent didn't adequately validate the edited workflow structure before completion. The Docker success masked underlying issues that required follow-up correction work.
follow_up_pattern: User reported downstream workflow validation failure requiring immediate fixes to YAML syntax in the GitHub Actions workflow file.
